Wilfredo tiene 44 años de edad, tiene tres hijos; pero solo una hija de 14 años de edad vive con él y está estudiando el 8ª. Grado, en un centro escolar estatal dentro de la misma comunidad. Él se separado de  su esposa desde hace 6 años, por lo que  se hizo responsable de sus hijos.

Se dedica a trabajar como agricultor, actividad que la realizan de tradición familiar, cultivando maíz, camote y  yuca. Generalmente obtienen buenas cosechas considerando que los campos de siembra son muy fértiles, por estar en las áreas del volcán Chaparrastique y también; posee una yunta de bueyes con los que realiza sus labores de cultivos y ofrece sus servicios a otros agricultores de la zona.

Todos los insumos agrícolas los adquiere en la ciudad, situados a 7 kilómetros  de su vivienda, para transportarlas se asociaron otras personas, debido a que tienen que pagar vehículo particular, en esta comunidad no cuentan con servicio de transporte público.

El préstamo será invertido en el pago de arrendamientos de las tierras que cultiva paga $125.00 por 7,000 metros cuadrados y alquila 28,000 metros cuadrados aproximadamente, las que son de utilidad para pastorear sus bueyes y sus dos vacas; también, para realizar sus cultivos.  Con el capital restante, realizará la cosecha de sus cultivos 10,000 metros cuadrados de maíz, 3,500 metros cuadrados de yuca y 3,062 metros cuadrados de camote.

Con esta inversión asegura la tierra en la que cultiva y pastorea sus semovientes. Su deseo es ampliar más sus áreas de cultivo y dedicarse al cultivo de hortalizas, considera que son más rentables pero requieren de mayor inversión; también, construir su vivienda de bloque y que al menos su hija (última) estudie en algún centro Tecnológico de la zona.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 44, has three children but only his 14-year-old daughter who is in the 8th grade in a local public school is living with him.  He’s been separated from his wife for six years which is why his children are in his care.  He works in agriculture, a family tradition, growing corn, yams and manioc.  He usually gets good harvests since the fields he cultivates are very fertile because they are in the vicinity of the Chaparrastique volcano.  In addition, he owns a team of oxen he uses to do his field chores and also offers their services to other farmers in the area.  He gets all his farm supplies in the city located 7 kilometers from his house.  In order to transport them he partners with others because they must contract a private vehicle since there is no public transportation available in this community.

The loan will be used to pay rental fees for the land he cultivates.  He pays $125 for every 7,000 square meters and he leases a total of 28,000 square meters approximately that are used as grazing land for his oxen and for his two cows and also to grow his crops on.  With the remaining capital, he will plant 10,000 square meters of corn, 3,500 square meters of manioc and 3,062 square meters of yams.

With this investment he will guarantee the land for cultivation and for grazing.  His wish is to expand his planting area and start growing vegetables that he feels are more profitable but that require a larger investment.  He’d also like to build a concrete block house and that at least his youngest daughter studies in some local technological center.

loans.use: para el pago del arrendamiento de las tierras que cultiva paga $125.00 por 7,000 metros cuadrados y alquila 28,000 metros cuadrados aproximadamente.

loans.name: Tima

texts.en:
Tima is a married woman. Together with her life partner, they enjoy their marriage with their four children.

Tima explains that she is a woman of many goals. She has been involved in food vending for the last year and, in the process, has established a loyal customer base. Specifically, she sells dumplings. In the future, she aspires to operate her own a café.

She needs to invest in her business but she has insufficient capital of her own to do so. As a result, she is seeking a loan in the amount of 5,000 KES to buy ingredients like wheat flour, baking powder, and cooking oils.

loans.use: to expand and improve her business by purchasing additional ingredients (e.g., wheat flour, baking powder, and cooking oils).

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en: Rehema is seeking a new loan to invest in her existing business. She is grateful for the support she received from the previous loan, which she says enabled her to increase sales as well as customers. She hopes that this loan will also have a tremendous impact on both her business and her family's living standards. The loan she is now requesting would be used to buy additional fabric and a new sewing machine.

loans.use: to expand and improve her tailoring business by purchasing additional fabric and a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose became a widower during the early stage of his marriage. Since then, he has been the father and mother of his three daughters: Lean, Shella, and Melvin Joy – 14 years old. 

Jose is very assiduous in his farming business. But due to lack of money, he could not sustain all his farming needs. He really needs to continue his farming business because it is the only means for him to send his children to school and for his eldest child to pursue her college education. 

Jose requests a loan of 30,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to purchase farm inputs like fertilizers and seeds. He is really thankful to God that there are people who are willing to lend him without asking for high interest compared to the traders. He is proud that despite being a single parent, he still manages to send his children to school. He is able to do this because he manages the farm and hog raising businesses well. 

Jose is a man with a word of honor. He does not promise anything that he is not sure of. He said that he will sacrifice everything to provide a better life for his children, so he has to work hard and pray for his success.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs like fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Mwanalima

texts.en: Owning a boutique sometime is one of Mwanalima’s goals. She is married to a mason and together they have four children. She is a visionary woman who always looks for new opportunities. For two years, Mwanalima has been selling khangas (traditional African cloth) at retail. She at times sells through orders. Some of her customers buy on credit and pay later. Currently, she has received many orders and she does not want to disappoint her regular customers. Mwanalima says that the cash in hand is not enough to cater for the needs of her customers. For this reason, she is requesting for a loan to buy bales of khangas for sell.

loans.use: to buy bales of khangas (traditional African cloth) to sell.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Facing challenges at times leads to some people to give up in life. However, this is not true of this young woman, mother of three children. She is married and lives with her family in the town of Tiribe. All of her children are in school. For the last 12 years, Mariam has been selling cosmetics in a shop. It is a business which has been doing well and she counts good results. She is a very caring, jovial woman who does not believe in failure. She always tries every opportunity that she comes across. Mariam is currently asking for a loan to purchase more cosmetic and beauty products to offer a variety to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetic and beauty products.

loans.name: Khishigjargal

texts.en:
Khishigjargal is a 38-year-old woman who trained as a professional plasterer. She lives with her husband and three kids in a "ger" (Mongolian yurt) in the suburbs of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her oldest son is a student at university, while the other two attend a local secondary school. Khishigjargal has been operating a shoe-making and -retailing business since 1998, together with her husband. 

Khishigjargal sells their handmade shoes at a large outdoor market in Mongolia.  Over the past years, they have gained a large number of customers from the countryside; therefore, they make shoes to order as well. Her husband and one assistant make the handcrafted shoes, while Khishigjargal runs the market stall. The business profitability depends on the season, yet the business goes well all the time.

She is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT (Mongolian Tugriks) to make more shoes for this fall season. She is a hard-working woman, who wants to provide her children with an excellent education. She is also one of our very trusted Kiva clients.

loans.use: to increase her working capital, so she can buy more materials for making handcrafted shoes.

loans.name: Marlen

texts.es:
La señora Marlen de 30 años de edad es  madre soltera y tiene una hija de tres años   de  edad,  tiene local  propio y se dedica desde hace 1  años ala crianza y engorde de pollos, su negocio es en toda la región donde entrega su producto ya empacado listo para consumirlo, sus clientes son todas las pulpería y mercaditos que le hacen pedidos  cada quince días, y todos las personas de la comunidad que llegan a  comprar a su casa de habitación. Su negocio  esta ubicado en  la comunidad del Espino la Montaña al sur de Honduras.
Doña Marlen esta solicitando 10,000.00 lempiras para compra de concentrado, vacunas y vitaminas para su granja. Con las ganancias y el apoyo de este préstamo  Doña Marlen  desea salir adelante y seguir mejorando su negocio y brindarles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
Doña Marlen su sueño es tener su granja más grande.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2012.
texts.en:
Marlen, 30, is a single mother of a three-year-old daughter.  She has her own locale and has been working for the last year raising chickens.  She sells her product packed and ready for consumption throughout the region.  Her customers are all the grocery stores and small markets that place orders every two weeks and all the people form the community who come by her house to buy from her.  Her business is located in the community of Espino La Montaña in south Honduras.

Marlen is asking for a 10,000 Lempira loan to buy feed concentrate, vaccines and vitamins for her farm.  With profits and support from this loan Marlen wants to get ahead and continue improving her business and to provide better customer service.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October, 2012

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccines and vitamins.

loans.name: Elena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC,la socia continua con su negocio de bar ,la socia vende lo que son bebidas como cerveza ,gaseosas,agua entre otros,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja desde las 4:00pm hasta la 01:00am aproximadamente,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de cerveza para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuoatas establecidas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
Elena belongs to the communal bank HATUN RUMIYOC and continues to run her bar business. She sell beverages such as beer, sodas, water, and more. For years she has managed her business, working from 4:00 p.m. until about 1:00 a.m. She is responsible and hardworking because she must support her family.

Elena is applying for a loan to buy beer for her business. She is grateful for the loan offered and promises to make her payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy beer for her business.

loans.name: Lesly

texts.es:
La señora Lesly  de 36 años de edad,  vive con sus dos hijos  en su casa ubicada en la comunidad de Altos de la Cruz San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 3 años al negocio de venta de ropa usada de manera ambulante sus clientes son los amigos, familiares y vecinos que ella visita tres veces por semana.
Doña Lesly esta solicitando 5,000.00 para la compra de pantalones, blusas, camisas, camisetas, ropa de niño y sudaderas. Ya que para esta época se vende bastante este tipo de prendas de vestir. Con el apoyo de este préstamo ella pretende suplir la necesidad de financiamiento para su negocio y de esta manera tener mejores ganancias y mejorar un poco su condición de vida.
Doña Lesly su sueño es crecer en su negocio  y mejorar su casa.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Lesly, 36, lives with her two children in a house located in the community of Altos de la Cruz, San Lorenzo, in south Honduras.  For the last three years she’s been in the business of selling used clothes from place to place.  Her customers are friends, family members and neighbors she visits three times a week.

Lesly is requesting a 5,000 Lempira loan to buy pants, shirts, blouses, t-shirts, children’s clothes and sweatshirts because she sells quite a bit of clothes this season.  With support from the loan she intends to cover her need for business financing to obtain higher profits and improve her living conditions a bit.  Lesly’s dream is to grow in business and do some home improvements.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - October, 2012.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Salimu

texts.en: Salimu is a divorced mother of three children. She runs a vegetable stall at the market selling a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables. Salimu is a hard-working and visionary woman who has the urge to move forward. Despite the challenges she is going through, she always has the spirit of overcoming them. She knows that one day she will achieve the goals she has set. Salimu is taking out a loan to invest purchase more fruits and vegetables. She has some plans of opening a clothes-selling business in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase of more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy sweets like chocolates, lollipops and cookies, among others.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Cienaga Group

texts.es:
La señora Marta es madre soltera, tiene 42 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 3 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica  al bordado de blusas, inicio este negocio siendo operaria para el negocio de una familiar de ella y hasta el momento lleva 20 años de experiencia,, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo, quien se dedica a presta sus servicio de jornalero.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo, que le servirá para la compra de materiales para bordado de blusas, espera en el futuro, tener a varias personas trabajando para su negocio, generando así fuentes de trabajo para otras personas. Las demás integrantes del grupo, se dedican a la crianza de animales, y bordado de blusas.
texts.en:
Marta is a 42-year-old single mother who did not have the chance to go to school. She has four children, three of whom are students. She embroiders blouses, a skill she performed as an operator for a family business, and she now has 20 years of experience. Her husband, a day laborer, helps her.

She is organizing a group to apply for a loan which she will use to buy materials to embroider blouses. She hopes to employ several workers for her business, thereby generating income for others. The other members of the communal bank raise livestock and embroider blouses.

loans.use: To buy cloths to embroider.

loans.name: Marleny Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Marleny tiene 31 años de edad , es madre soltera, tiene un hijo de 16 años que vive con los abuelos paternos y con las que convive son con  sus dos hijas de 9 y 3 años respectivamente. La casa donde vive la renta por $50.00 al mes, vive en ella desde hace más de 5 años.

Ella es una persona muy laboriosa, durante la mañana se dedica a lavar y planchar ropa de personas dentro su comunidad, cobrando $2.50 por cada docena de piezas lavadas y le ayuda en la elaboración de tortillas a una amiga todos los días, por lo que recibe un pago de $5.00; por las tardes hace la limpieza en un restaurante de la ciudad.

Marleny solicita el préstamo para comprar  un comedor  y  ropa para sus tres hijos. Actualmente, en su hogar no cuenta con este mueble muy importante para compartir los alimentos en familia y de igual forma para que sus hijos realicen las tareas escolares. 

Su deseo es continuar trabajando para comprar su propia vivienda y lograr que sus hijos estudien para que sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Marleny is a 31-year-old single mother. Her 16-year-old son lives with his paternal grandparents, while her other sons, ages 9 and 3, live with her. She rents the house they have been living in for the past five years for $50 a month. She works hard, washing and ironing laundry for neighbors in the morning and charging $2.50 per dozen pieces. She helps a friend make tortillas for $5 each day. In the evenings, she cleans a restaurant in the city.

Marleny is applying for a loan to buy a dining room set and clothing for her children. She does not have furniture in the house where her family can eat together and her children can do their homework. She hopes to keep working to buy her own house and to see her children study for professional careers.

loans.use: to buy a dining room set and clothing for her children.

loans.name: Yoli Elita

texts.es:
Yoli es una mujer de 43 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con sus seis hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, lastimosamente es madres soltera, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; Yoli no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocina un riquísimo Lomo Saltado para compartir con su familia.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Yoli trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de refrescos y frutas, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, ella puede trabajar un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Yoli se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una mototaxi, la cual utilizara para alquilarla a choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para que al lado de su familia pueda lograr su sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Yoli, 43, is a woman living in the city of Pucallpa with her six children who she loves and are her main reason for living.  Sadly, she’s a single mother.  She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who focuses all her efforts into moving her family forward.  Yoli was unable to study a professional career because she had to start working very young to help out her parents.  In her free time she enjoys cooking a delicious “Lomo Saltado” to share with her family.

With much effort and dedication, Yoli works in her small business selling fruit and beverages.  She starts work very early every day and can work about ten hours daily.  She feels good working and thinks she does well because of the kind way she treats her customers.

Yoli is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided she will be able to buy a mototaxi that she’ll least out to drivers to provide transportation services and she can continue working and striving so that alongside her family she can reach her dream of seeing her children become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy a mototaxi.

loans.name: Ericson

texts.es:
Ericson es un hombre de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su pareja y sus tres pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que junto con su pareja dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente Ericson no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Contabilidad, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, en sus ratos libres le gusta pasear por las calurosas y acogedoras calles de su ciudad y en algunas ocasiones aprovecha la oportunidad para comer un riquísimo Chilcano de Carachama, el cual es su comida favorita.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, Erickson trabaja como obrero en una empresa ladrillera de su ciudad, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana inicia su labor, él puede trabajar un aproximado de 12 horas y cree que le va bien por su desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Ericson se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, él desea comprar materiales de construcción y pagar la mano de obrar para realizar el cercado de su hogar, de esta manera Ericson tendrá su vivienda en mejores condiciones, adecuadas y seguras, que brinden mayor seguridad para él y su familia, así pues Ericson seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr sus metas y su sueño de tener un negocio de venta de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Ericson is a 38 year old man.  He lives in the city of Pucallpa with his life partner and their three little children.  He loves them, and they are his main reason for living.  He is a very kind, hard-working, and enthusiastic person.  He and his life partner devote all of their efforts into getting their family ahead.

Unfortunately, Ericson was not able to study for a professional career in accounting.  Ever since he was very young he had to work to support his parents.  In his free time he likes to take walks on the warm and welcoming streets of his city.  Sometimes he takes advantage of the opportunity to eat the delicious ‘Chilcano de Carachama’ [a fish dish], which is his favorite food. 

Ericson works with a great deal of effort and diligence as a worker in a brick company in his city.  He works every day, and he starts his work in the early morning hours.  He can work approximately 12 hours.  He believes that it is going well for him because of his effort and the kind way he treats his customers.

Ericson is very grateful to the Kiva lenders.  Thanks to the help given to him he will be able to improve his house.  He wishes to buy construction materials and to pay for labor to build a wall around his house.  This way Ericson’s house will be in better condition.  It will be safe and sound so that it provides him and his family with greater security.  Ericson will continue working and putting forth great effort in order to achieve his goal and his dream of having a business selling groceries.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve his house.

loans.name: Felicitas

texts.es:
Alegre y participativa, así es Felicitas con 42 años de edad lleva consigo varios años de  matrimonio con  Cesario, complementan su alegría familiar sus 5 hijos. Posee una vivienda hecha a base de material noble que logró concretar hace 3 años con ayuda de su esposo. Viendo la buena demanda considerable que presentaban las tiendas de abarrotes y teniendo el deseo de desempeñarse comercialmente, inicio hace 4 años con su negocio , al inicio algo desabastecido pero con lo necesario para proyectar a largo plazo un buen negocio a favor de su clientela. Es así que ambiento en un ambiente de su casa, su tienda, con andamios simples y sin vitrina teniendo que ella sola hacerse cargo durante el día, pero siempre con la motivación de seguir trabajando ya que cumplía hasta ese entonces un objetivo para su familia. Posteriormente y gracias a los préstamos de MFP fue ampliando su negocio hasta volverse uno de los más competentes de su barrio siendo un poquito más rentable con el pasar de los días. ahora con el fin de cumplir con la demanda y el crecimiento comercial, desea comprarse una refrigeradora para ofrecer bebidas heladas y más mercadería para su negocio.
Tiene consigo 15 préstamos con MFP, desde siempre demostró puntualidad y responsabilidad con sus pagos, le es grato pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que son un número considerable de socios muy conocidos, generándole esto mucha confianza.
Con los 2,000 realizará la compra de una refrigeradora y demás mercadería para continuar abasteciendo su negocio.
texts.en:
Cheerful and participative is how Felicitas, 42, has been married to Cesario for several years; their family joy is compounded by five children.  She has a house made out of substantial materials she managed to acquire three years ago with her husband’s help.  

Seeing the good demand grocery stores had and wanting to become a merchant, she started her business four years ago.  At first she only stocked the bare necessities but her long-range plan was to become well established with her clientele.  This was how she set aside space at home to set up her store with simple shelving and no display case; she tended to it by herself all day but always motivated to continue working because she was reaching for a family goal.  

Later on and thanks to MFP loans she gradually expanded the business until she became one of the most competent in her neighborhood and as time passed more profitable too.  Now, aiming at meeting demand and commercial growth, she wants to buy a refrigerator so she can offer cold beverages and to buy more merchandise for the store.

She’s had 15 MFP loans and always has been punctual and responsible with her payments.  She enjoys being part of her communal bank because they are a large number of well-known members which makes her very confident.  She will use the 2,000 to buy a refrigerator and other merchandise to continue stocking the store.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and goods to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es un hombre de 32 años, vive en la ciudad de Cañete, en el distrito de Imperial con su esposa, a quien ama y es su fiel compañera, él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos para salir adelante; lamentablemente Miguel no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, ya que desde muy joven tuvo que trabajar para apoyar a sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo.
Con mucho empeño y dedicación, día a día Miguel trabaja como ayudante en una panadería de su ciudad, él trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 8  horas, él se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Miguel se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de mesas y sillas, las cuales le servirán de mucho para poder acondicionar su pequeño negocio de venta de comida, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener un restaurante grande y reconocido.
texts.en:
Miguel is 32 years old. He lives in the city of Cañete, in the district of Imperial with his wife, whom he loves and she is his faithful companion. He is a very friendly person, hardworking and enthusiastic, who devotes all his efforts to getting ahead. Unfortunately, Miguel could not study for a professional career, since he had to work since he was very young in order to support his parents, but he would have liked to.

With a lot of effort and dedication, everyday Miguel works as an assistant in a bakery in his city. He works every day from the early hours in the morning and works for approximately 8 hours. He likes his work and feels that it is going well because of his good performance and because of the kind treatment he gives his customers.

Miguel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, and thanks to the help given he can buy tables and chairs, which will be useful outfitting his small business selling food, so he will continue working and striving to achieve his big dream of having a large and well-known restaurant.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs to outfit his small business selling food

loans.name: Hilaria Ursula

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de artesania,la socia trabaja de forma independiente distribuyendo su mercaderia a sus clientes que mas le solicitan,a la vez la socia tambien continua dedicandose a tejer chompas de alpaca para su negocio siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de lana de alpaca para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otrgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuoast establecidas.
texts.en:
Hilaria Úrsula is a member of the “HATAN RUMIYOC” communal bank. She still has her business selling crafts. She works independently, distributing her merchandise to the customers that order the most from her. 

At the same time, she has also been knitting alpaca sweaters for her business and this is the way in which she raises her family. She is requesting the loan for the purchase of alpaca wool for her business. 

She feels grateful for the loan being granted and she is committed to making the established payments.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool for her business

loans.name: Rosita 25 De Julio Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSITAS 25 DE JULIO”  iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Susana es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tejido de mantas, venta de calzados, confección de chamarras, taller de costura de overoles, tejido de chompas, tejido de gorras, tejido a macramé, decoración de autos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Susana es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de decoración de autos que es un negocio familiar y lo emprendieron por iniciativa de su esposo mismo que apoya en la venta.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de accesorios para automóviles) que adquirirá de las tiendas que venden por mayor posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyarse económicamente a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros.
texts.en:
The “Rositas 25 de Julio” communal bank will start its sixth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Focal Center.  It has nine members led by a governing board presided over by Susana.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses among which are blanket weaving, shoe sales, jacket manufacturing, overall sewing shop, sweater knitting, cap knitting, macramé weaving and auto detailing.  The loan they’ll take out will benefit small micro businesswomen.

Susana is one of the members.  She indicates that she’s been a member of Pro Mujer for two years having joined thanks to an invitation from a girlfriend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has an auto detailing business that’s a family business that arose from her and her husband’s joint initiative; he helps her with the sales.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy accessories for cars in stores that sell them at wholesale and then she’ll resell them in her store.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support herself and her family since she’s married and has three children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the savings.

loans.use: to buy auto accessories.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a widowed mother of two who lives with her children in the town of Tiribe. Although she has experienced various adversaries, she is resolute in her determination for a better life.

For the last 10 years, Fatuma has been operating a poultry business, selling her chicken products at the market and from home. Thanks to her efforts, she has been able to educate her children. She is currently requesting a loan to buy more chicks and chicken feeds.

loans.use: to buy chicks and chicken feeds.

loans.name: Armada Boliviana Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ARMADA BOLIVIANA”  iniciará el decimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Los Andes, está compuesta por doce integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Nieves es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de sombreritos, venta de gaseosas, venta de chamarras, venta de ropa de vestir, artesanía en tejidos, encuadernación y tapas de carpetas, venta de perfumes y cosméticos, venta de gasolinas, venta de mochilas, venta de queso, venta de verduras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Nieves es integrante, ella indica que hace ocho años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa, cuenta que este negocio lo emprendió hace ocho años con el préstamo obtenido de Pro Mujer; en la actualidad creció su negocio pero como ya iniciará la temporada navideña debe tener más capital.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa) que adquirirá de las vendedoras por mayor y posterior lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyarse económicamente a su familia pues ella es casada y tiene ocho hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que las capacitaciones en crédito y salud.

En la fotografía la señora Sabina no aparese ya que se coloco muy detrás y solo se identifica su sombrero.
texts.en:
The “Armada Boliviana” communal bank will start its tenth cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Focal Center.  It has 12 members led by a governing board presided by Nieves.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses among which are hat sales, soft-drink sales, jacket sales, clothes sales, knitted crafts, bookbinding, perfume and cosmetics sales, fuel sales, backpack sales, cheese sales and grocery sales.  The loan they’ll take out will benefit small micro businesswomen.

Nieves is a member and she indicates that she’s been part of Pro Mujer for 8 years having joined thanks to an invitation from a girlfriend who is a member of the institution.  She has a business selling clothes she says she started 8 years ago with the loan she got from Pro Mujer.  Her business has grown to date but because the Christmas season is about to start she must have more capital.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy clothes from wholesalers and then resell it in her shop.  This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family since she’s married and has 8 children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the credit training and the health services.

Sabina does not appear in the photo because she stood too far back and all that’s visible is her hat.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Blanca Luz

texts.es: Blanca vive junto a cuatro hijos menores de edad, quienes dependen por completo de ella ya que es madre soltera. Blanca trabaja elaborando alimentos en un pequeño pueblo, siendo este un lugar de comercio lo que facilita a Blanca su trabajo ya que varias personas consumen sus alimentos diariamente. Muchas veces vende almuerzos incluso en horas de la tarde y se ve obligada a calentara toda la comida, para evitar esto Blanca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda comprar un  horno microondas y así poder recalentar únicamente los alimentos necesarios. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que tiene el deseo de mejorar día con día
texts.en: Blanca lives with her four minor children who are completely dependent on her because she’s a single mother.  Blanca works preparing food in her small town which is a commercial center which makes Blanca’s job easier since several people come by to consume her meals daily.  She often sells lunches and sometimes in the early evening too and she has to reheat all the food.  To avoid this, Blanca’s asking Integral for a loan to buy a microwave oven so that she can reheat only the food she needs to.  She’s a very hardworking person who wants to improve every day.

loans.use: to buy a microwave oven.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 46 años de edad es muy alegre y trabajadora y cuenta con grandes deseos de salir adelante en la vida, vive únicamente junto a su compañero de vida quien también trabaja. María posee una venta en el mercado de granos básicos, aceite, café, especias, lejías y jabones, tintes y accesorios para el cabello entre otros más. María solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más productos sobretodo tintes y cremas para el cabello, debido a que se acerca la temporada alta de fin de año ella desea surtir lo más posible su negocio y de esta manera aumentar sus ventas, lo que le permita iniciar un mejor año.
texts.en: María, 46, is very cheerful and hardworking and very much wants to get ahead in life.  She lives just with her life companion who also works.  María has a stand in the local market where she sells basic grains, oil, coffee, spices, bleach, soap, hair color and hair accessories, among many others.  She’s asking Integral for a loan to have money needed to buy more products, especially hair color and hair creams because the high sales end-of-year season is approaching and she wants to be as well-stocked as possible so sales will increase and she can start off a better year.

loans.use: to buy hair color and hair creams to sell.

loans.name: Buena Semilla Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BUENA SEMILLA”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Fanny es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ponchos, venta de comida, venta de polainas, venta de leche y vaquitas, venta de artefactos, venta de calzados.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Fanny es integrante, ella indica que hace siete meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por ingresando por invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de polainas y gorras de alpaca, cuenta que esta técnica de tejido y la forma de negocio lo aprendió de su cuñado y posteriormente lo trabajo independientemente.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lana de alpaca) que adquirirá de las ferias tradicionales de El Alto y posterior a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyarse económicamente a su familia pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros.
texts.en:
The “Buena Semilla” communal bank will start its third cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes Focal Center. It has 8 members and a governing board headed by Fanny. The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses. Among them we have: sales of ponchos, food sales, legwarmer sales, milk and cow sales, artifact sales, and selling footwear. 

The loan will help small entrepreneurs where Fanny is a member. She has been with Pro Mujer for seven months after being invited by a friend who is a member of the institution. She currently has a business weaving legwarmers and alpaca hats. She learned this knitting technique from her brother-in-law and later worked independently. This loan will be used to increase her capital (purchase alpaca wool) acquired from the traditional fairs of El Alto. After finishing her product, she will sell from her sales location. This work allows her to earn an income as financial support for her family since she has a common-law husband and a son.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the savings.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool.

loans.name: Rafael Ernesto

texts.es: Rafael de 25 años de edad, es un joven muy responsable y dedicado al bienestar de sus padres, junto a quienes reside. Rafael posee una venta de sorbetes y paletas, y así mismo vende productos lácteos como: queso, crema, requesón y otros. Esto último lo realiza junto a su padre. Rafael tiene muchas ventajas con su venta de sorbetes ya que vive en un pueblo en el que él es el único distribuidos en todo el lugar lo que es muy bueno para sus ganancias. Rafael solicita un préstamo para poder comprar sorbetes y paletas por mayor y seguir surtiendo a otros vendedores de forma que sus ventas sean fijas.
texts.en:
Rafael, 25, is a very responsible young man who is dedicated to maintaining the welfare of his parents, who he lives with. Rafael has a business selling sorbets and popsicles, and he also sells dairy products such as: cheese, cream, cottage cheese and others. He does this together with his father.

Rafael has many advantages in his sorbet sales. He lives in a town where he is the only distributor in the whole place, which is very good for his earnings.

Rafael is requesting a loan to be able to buy wholesale sorbet and popsicles and continue providing stock to other vendors so that his sales are steady.

loans.use: to purchase ice cream to sell

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
La motivación y respeto a los demás caracteriza a Jorge, un hombre trabajador. él tiene 42 años y esta casado con Flora. Juntos tienen 4 hijos y actualmente habitan en una vivienda hecha a base de madera. Actualmente posee parcelas y en ellas ha cultivado cacao, café , yuca y maíz , tiene consigo mas de 20 años de experiencia en el rubro agrícola, y lo reconfortante es que gracias a ello pudo brindarles a sus hijos una buena educación con todas las comodidades. Sin embargo, el mall tiempo hace que su siembra sean afectadas de mucha humedad, debido a las constantes lluvias. Por ello desea conseguir plantas almacigos de café y continuar con la producción de este grano, que tiene mucha demanda en el mercado. Asimismo desea adquirir un lote para vivienda en la ciudad en donde planea construir una casa y enviar a sus hijos para que puedan estudiar alguna carrera superior. Este viene a ser su séptimo crédito con MFP, tiene como antecedente un buen cumplimiento y responsabilidad con el pago de sus cuotas, Su responsabilidad y honradez le han valido para ser parte de la junta directiva de su grupo como presidente del mismo.
Con los 1,500 nuevos soles podrá contratar jornaleros para culminar en menos de un mes el sembrío de plantas de almácigos de café.
texts.en: Motivation and respect for others characterize Jorge, a working man. He is 42 years old and is married to Flora. Together they have 4 children and they currently live in a home made of wood. Today they have parcels in which they have cultivated cocoa, coffee, yuca and corn. He has more than 20 years of experience in agricultural work. What is heartwarming is that thanks to this work he was able to provide his children with a good education with all of the amenities. However, the bad weather caused his crop to be affected by a lot of humidity, due to the constant rains. Because of this he desires to purchase coffee seedlings and to continue with the production of this crop which is in high demand at the market. He also wants to rent a lot for a home in the city where he plans to construct a home and send his children so that they can study a superior career. This will be his 7th loan with MFP. He has a history of compliance and responsibility regarding the payment of his shares. His responsibility and honesty has led him to be part of the board of his group, as president of the board. With the 1500 nuevos soles he will pay laborers to complete, in less than a month, the planting of the coffee seedlings.

loans.use: to pay laborers.

loans.name: Maria Esperanza

texts.es: María es muy trabajadora y responsable en todas las áreas de su vida, por eso cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales. Ella vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos quienes son una familia muy unida. María posee una venta mariscos en el mercado del pueblo en que reside, desde hace 8 años que la tienen y ha sido de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar y su familia. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para realizar la compra de mayor cantidad de mariscos de diferentes tipos, así mismo para comprar diversidad de tamaños y así ofrecer diferentes precios con lo que pueda abarcar un mercado mucho más amplio.
texts.en:
María is very hard-working and responsible in all areas of her life. For that reason, she has very good personal references. She lives with her husband and two children, and they are a very united family. 

María has a business selling seafood in the market of the town where she lives. She has been selling at this market for eight years and it has been very helpful for the support of her home and family. 

She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to have the money necessary to purchase a larger quantity of seafood of different types, and buy a variety of sizes and that way she can offer different prices and cover a much larger market.

loans.use: to buy seafood to sell

loans.name: Jackelyn Gabriela

texts.es: Jackelyn de 29 años de edad, es una persona muy dedicada a su familia, ella vive junto a su madre y su padre y un pequeño sobrino de 13 años de edad, su familia es pequeña pero trabaja muy arduamente por ellos. Jackelyn se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas desde hace 15 años cuando le ayudaba a su madre, ahora debido a la avanzada edad de su mamá Jackelyn las elabora sola, contando siempre con muchos clientes fijos quienes por tradición consumen sus tortillas. Ella solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor y así mismo leña para cocer el maíz, con lo que podrá ahorrar más gas propano y será mucho más barato para ella.
texts.en: Jackelyn, 29, is a person who is very devoted to her family.  She lives with her mother and father and a young nephew, aged 13.  Her family is small, but she works arduously for them.  Jackelyn has been making tortillas for 15 years.  She used to help her mother in the business, but now, due to her mother's advanced age, Jackelyn works on her own.  She has many regular customers who have traditionally consumed her tortillas.  Jackelyn is requesting a loan so that she can buy corn at wholesale and firewood to cook the corn.  This way she could save on propane gas, and so this will be much cheaper for her.

loans.use: to buy corn for her business

loans.name: Mirna Angelica

texts.es: Mirna de 48 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y un hijo quien estudia. Mirna posee una venta de comida desde hace muchos años atrás, lo que le ha ayudado para ser muy conocida e ir obteniendo varios clientes con el paso del tiempo, sus ventas son bastante estables, las cuales desea mejorar significativamente. Mirna solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de granos básicos, carne, frutas y verduras, las cuales le permitan realizar mayor cantidad y variedad de comida y de este modo darle un mejor servicio a sus clientes quienes se encuentren satisfechos y así den referencias positivas del negocio de Mirna y pueda obtener otros nuevos, lo que será de gran beneficio para ella.
texts.en: Mirna, 48, lives with her husband and a son who studies. Mirna has been selling food for many years, which has helped her to become well-known and earn clients as time passes by. Her sales are very stable and she wishes to improve them significantly. Mirna has requested a loan from INTEGRAL  [MFI] to have the capital required to purchase staple grains, meat, fruits, and vegetables that will help her increase the quantity and variety of food offered. In this way, she can give a better service to her customers who are very satisfied and will give positive feedback about her business to gain new clients, which will be very beneficial for her.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, vegetables, and fruits.

loans.name: Ana Emerita

texts.es: Ana de 41 años de edad, es una persona que trabaja muy duro para llevar el sustento a su hogar, ella vive junto a tres hijos únicamente y su esposo se encuentra en Los Estados Unidos mandándole remesas mensuales. Para poder tener una vida mejor Ana se dedica a la venta de tortillas y recientemente inició con la elaboración de pupusas, un trabajo bastante pesado pero que vale la pena por el bien de sus hijos. Ana solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de este modo poder comprar mayor cantidad de granos básicos como: maíz y frijoles, así mismo para comprar queso, verduras y bebidas frías y calientes para acompañar las pupusas. Con esto Ana mejorará sus ventas lo cual es muy importante para ella.
texts.en: Ana, 41, is a person who works very hard to support her home.  She lives just with her three children since her husband is in the United States; he sends her monthly stipends.  In order to have a better life, Ana sells tortillas and recently started making ‘pupusas’ [filled, grilled corncakes], pretty demanding work but worthwhile for her children’s wellbeing.  Ana is asking Integral for a loan to buy larger amounts of basic grains like corn and beans as well as cheese, vegetables and both cold and hot beverages to serve alongside the pupusas.  With this, Ana will improve her sales which is of utmost importance to her.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana de 35 años de edad, vive junto a su madre de 67 años de edad, y junto a su abuela de 93, su madre le ayuda con lo quehaceres del hogar y también un poco con el negocio, ya que se le hace difícil ya que son jornadas largas. Ana trabaja comercializando pan francés y diferentes tipos de pan dulce, los cuales vende de forma ambulante por distintas colonias, el trabajo lo realiza todas las tardes y también vende en su casa de habitación lo que le permite percibir una pequeña fuente más de ingresos. Ana solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de variedad de pan dulce y mayor cantidad de pan francés el cual se consume a diario por lo que es un negocio muy rentable. Ana espera incrementar sus ventas y así poder vivir mejor junto a su abuela y su madre.
texts.en: Ana, 35, lives with her 67-year-old mother and 93-year-old grandmother.  Her mother helps her with the household chores and sometimes a little with the business too because the long work days are hard on her.  Ana works selling French bread and various types of sweet bread from place to place in different neighborhoods.  She works every afternoon and also sells from home earning a bit more money this way.  Ana is asking Integral for a loan to have the money needed to buy a variety of sweet bread and larger amounts of French bread that’s consumed daily which makes the business profitable.  Ana hopes to increase sales and be able to live better alongside her grandmother and her mother.

loans.use: to buy bread to sell.

loans.name: Blanca Mabel

texts.es: Blanca de 36 años de edad, vive junto a su compañero de vida y no tiene hijos. Ella trabaja comercializando cosméticos como: cremas para el cabello y cuerpo, labiales, sombras, rubores, y otros más, y así mismo vende perfumes, todo lo comercializa desde su casa y de forma ambulante para obtener más clientes y mejorar sus ventas. Blanca solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma aumentar su inventario para época navideña, en donde las ventas se incrementan significativamente permitiéndole tener mayores ganancias lo cual es el principal deseo de blanca.
texts.en: Blanca, 36, lives with her life companion; she has no children.  She works selling cosmetics like hair and body creams, lipstick, eye shadow, blush and others.  She also sells perfume.  She sells everything from home and from place to place to obtain more customers and increase her sales.  Blanca is asking Integral for a loan to increase inventory for the Christmas season when sales increase significantly making it possible for her to earn higher profits which is Blanca’s main wish.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is 33 years old and the married mother of two children. She lives in the rural area of Tiribe in her own house, which is thatched with mud walls. Her life partner is a mason. 

In 2005, Amina started a fish-selling business, selling in one of the busy streets of the town. She says that it has been a profitable project, and thanks to it, she has been able to provide her family with basic needs. 

Amina wants to add to her stocks of fish and cooking oil, but she does not have enough cash to do so. This is why she visited Yehu offices to request a loan to make this investment.

loans.use: to add her stocks of fish and cooking oil

loans.name: Silvia Yanira

texts.es: Silvia de 48 años de edad, vive desde hace muchos años en casa propia junto a tres hijos quienes le ayudan con los gastos del hogar. Silvia trabaja elaborando pupusas, pasteles de carne, yuca frita, empanadas, enchiladas y otros tipos de platillo típicos, estos se venden muy bien ya que pueden ser como refrigerio o como cena, razón por la que las personas le compran en algunos casos diariamente. Silvia es una persona trabajadora quien desea mejorar en la vida, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar materia prima como: maíz, carne, verduras, aceite, frijoles, queso y otros más para aumentar la cantidad de producción y de esta manera aumentar sus ventas significativamente.
texts.en: Silvia, 48, has lived for many years in her own house with her three children who help out with household expenses.  Silvia works making ‘pupusas’ [filled, grilled corncakes], meat pies, fried manioc, turnovers, enchiladas and other types of traditional dishes  that sell well because they can either be snacks or a main meal which is why people sometimes buy them every day.  Silvia is a hardworking woman who very much wants to improve her life which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy raw materials like corn, meat, vegetables, oil, beans, cheese and others to increase production capacity and thus significantly increase sales.

loans.use: to buy corn, meat, vegetables, oil and others.

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es: El Sr. Roberto tiene 39 años es casado con tres hijos que son de las edades de 2,4,y 15 años,  el se dedica a la fabricación de sillas de metal realiza este trabajo desde hace 9 años este oficio lo aprendio de su papa con quien trabajo desde muy joven, vende estos productos en su taller que se encuentra en la zona de Pampahasi, este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, el Sr. Roberto va a usar este préstamo para la compra de material para realizar su trabajo y así satisfacer la demandada de sus clientes, El Sr. Roberto  es una persona  con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que esta es la única fuente de ingresos que tiene para mantenerse.
texts.en: Roberto, 39, is married and has three children aged 2, 4 and 15 years.  He works manufacturing metal chairs, an occupation he’s been in for 9 years having learned it from his father who he worked with since he was very young.  He sells these products in his workshop located in the Pampahasi zone.  This loan is his first sequence within the institution and Roberto will use it to buy the materials needed to do his work and meet customer demand.  Roberto is a person with a strong wish for self-improvement and feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support provided since this is the only source of income he has to support himself with.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to manufacture metal chairs.

loans.name: Evelyn Armida

texts.es: Evelyn Armida  de treinta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas, tiene varios años de experiencia en el negocio y eso le ha dado la oportunidad de obtener siempre las mejores ganancias, la pupusería esta ubicada en el lugar cerca de su residencia ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas la prefieren porque vende las pupusas mas ricas y calientitas de la zona además tiene los mejores precios, y el servicio mas rápido; Evelyn es una mujer entregada a su labor, dispuesta a dar todo de su parte para cumplir sus sueños, su mas grande secreto es la perseverancia sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para aumentar la producción  por eso le solicita a INTGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, queso, chicharrón, frijol etc. Evelyn Armida tiene buenas referencias de pago y se hace responsable de cancelar la deuda y  a la vez tiene fe que podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Evelyn Armida, 38, lives with her family.  She has a business selling pupusas (a traditional dish made with a corn tortilla).  She has a number of years of experience with this business, and this has given her the opportunity to always obtain the best earnings.  Her pupusa stand is located in a place near her home, and she already has a lot of customers.  People prefer her business because she has the tastiest and hottest pupusas in the neighborhood.  In addition, she has the best prices, and very fast service.  Evelyn is a woman who is devoted to her work and is ready to give everything she has to reach her dreams.  Her greatest secret is her perseverance; she knows that this is required to reach success.  In recent weeks, her demand has been growing, and she wants to take advantage of this to expand her production.  This is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow her to buy corn at wholesale, cheese, pork, beans, etc.  

Evelyn Armida has good credit references and she accepts the responsibility of paying off her loan.  At the same time, she has faith that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale, cheese, pork and beans

loans.name: Athuman

texts.en:
The desire for a prosperous future is the dream of every merchant, and Athuman is an example. He is a married man with eight children, and he lives with his family in the coastal region of Kenya. 

He is a very industrious man who has been operating a poultry business for the past ten years. In addition to this business, he also sells coconuts at the market. Despite the good results he has achieved, he says that he constantly faces a major challenge of disease outbreak. 

Athuman is asking for this loan to buy chicken feed and more coconuts for sale.  His dream is to expand his businesses and have a worthy life.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed and more coconuts for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of coconuts for sale.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en:
The desire to have a prosperous future is a dream of most people, and Hamisi is a good example. He is 32 years of age, a married man and father of two.  

He is a dedicated man who has been operating a vegetable stall for two years. Hamisi lives in the rural area of Tiribe in the district of Msambweni, Coast Province. His dream is to own a retail shop.

He believes that his dream will come true through his hard work and your support. The loan he is requesting will help him buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, and kale.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, cabbages, and kale.

loans.name: Floricelda

texts.es:
La señora Floricelda tiene 49 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos. Desde hace cuatro años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de comida en el mercado, trabajo que aprendió por iniciativa propia. Antes solo se dedicaba a realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa.  Los insumos los adquiere en el mismo mercado todos los días. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar maíz, aceite, pollo, arroz, tomates, cebolla, chile, rábano, gas propano para cocinar y una mesa más para que coman los clientes. Con la inversión adquirirá mas insumos que le permitan aumentar la cantidad de comida que elabora y por consiguiente venderá más obteniendo mejores ingresos para su familia. Su meta es instalar su negocio en su propia casa para no tener que desplazarse hasta el mercado.
texts.en:
Floricelda, 49, is married and has two children. For four years she has been making and selling food in the market, which is work she learned to do by her own initiative. Before, she only devoted her time to doing domestic work in her home. She acquires her supplies in the market itself every day.

The loan she is requesting from Fundación Campo is for buying corn, oil, chicken, rice, tomatoes, onions, chilis, radish, propane gas for cooking and another table for the clients to eat at. 

With this investment she will attain more supplies which will allow her to increase the quantity of food she makes and consequently sell more and obtain a better income for her family. 

Her goal is to install her business in her own home so she does not have to travel to and from the market.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, chicken, rice, tomatoes, onions, chilis, radish, propane gas for cooking and another table for the clients to eat at

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es: Berta de 60 años de edad vive con su familia actualmente. Es un mujer muy emprendedora que siempre ha entregado todo para darle lo mejor a su familia es muy conocida por sus vecinos por ser ejemplo en su hogar ya que es una mujer trabajadora, responsable y oficiosa. Berta desde hace un tiempo posee una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, por su forma y manera de ser posee de clientela ya que maneja precios accesibles, ella desea incrementar sus ganancias pero no posee el capital suficiente para llevar a cabo su sueño es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así seguir abasteciendo su tienda y comprar artículos como: huevos, leche, frijoles, azúcar, sopas instantáneas, espera contar con la ayuda que necesita y así poder seguir siendo mujer ejemplo a en su hogar.
texts.en:
Berta is 60 years old and presently lives with her family. She is a very enterprising woman who has always given her all to provide the best for her family. She is very well known among her neighbors as an example in her home, since she is a hard-working, responsible, and efficient woman.

For some time how, Berta has had a small store where she sells articles of primary necessity. Due to her nature and manner of being, she possesses her clientele, in part, because she keeps her prices accessible. She wishes to increase her earnings but lacks sufficient capital to carry out her dream. 

That's why Berta approached INTEGRAL to request a loan and thus, continue supplying her store, purchasing articles such as eggs, milk, beans, sugar, and instant soups. Berta hopes she can count on the help she needs and be able to continue being an exemplary woman in her home.

loans.use: buy articles to sell in her little store, such as eggs, milk, beans, sugar, and instant soups.

loans.name: Kanini

texts.en:
Kanini is asking for a loan to make new investments. She is happy for the support she received and the one she is hoping to receive. 

Kanini has a good testimony for the progress of her business and the well being of her family. She says that the previous loan had a positive impact on both her vegetable business and her family’s living standards. 

She wants to expand her existing business and start a business selling mats at the market. For this reason, she is asking for this loan so as to buy fresh vegetables and stocks of mats for sale. Her goal is to run several businesses in future.

loans.use: to buy fresh vegetables and stocks of mats for sale.

loans.name: Nyamvula

texts.en:
Nyamvula is making a new investment in her business. She is happy to see her business improve using the previous loan. 

She is sure that this investment will also have a positive impact. She wants to buy more utensils, and if the amount stretches, she wants to invest it in the cultivation of her farm. Nyamvula is sure to repay her loan and ask for more loans so that she can move forward.

loans.use: to buy more household utensils to sell.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 30-year-old woman and mother of two young children. She lives with her family in the rural area of Tiribe in the coastal region of Kenya. 

For the past five years, Elizabeth has run a retail shop in her home, serving the neighborhood. Her goal is move forward in life, but her main challenges are the high prices of commodities and the lack of enough capital to invest in her business. 

She is, however, optimistic, and she is sure that this investment from the loan she is currently asking will help her grow her business. She plans to buy bales of flour, rice, sugar, and beans.

loans.use: to buy bales of flour, rice, sugar, and beans.

loans.name: Graciela Narda

texts.es: La Sra. Graciela tiene 48 años de edad, tiene un hijo que tiene la edad de 16 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de papelería, material de escritorio,  libros etc. Ella vende variedad de productos según a la temporada, tiene ubicado su bazar librería en la zona de Pampahasi en un lugar muy concurrido de la zona Sur, ella vive en casa familiar, ella solicita el crédito para proveerse de mercadería con la compra de material escolar para su librería – bazar ya que le va muy bien ya que por la ubicación del negocio tiene una buena venta y es una persona responsable y trabajadora, agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado, ya que esta es la única actividad con la que saca adelante a su hijo, su deseo es el de ver a su hijo profesional y que pueda ejercer su profesión.
texts.en:
Graciela is 48 years old, has a child, who is 16 years old. She makes a living selling stationery products, books etc. She sells variety of products according to the season. Her bookstore is located in the area of Pampahasi in a very busy place in the southern zone. 

She lives in a family house. She is requesting this loan to purchase school’s supplies for her bookstore, Bazar. The business is going well because of its location; as a result sales are good. She is a responsible and hard-working person. She is very thankful with the institution for its support as this helps her to get ahead her son. Her desire is to see her son become a professional and to be able to exercise his profession.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her bookstore such as notebooks, pens, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a calibrater, rectifiers, welders, a hand saw, a file, a drill, a screwdriver, and spanners, among others.

loans.name: Santos Mendaly

texts.es:
Santos, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertir en el negocio, ya que quiere crecer en su granja de pollos, a través del préstamo podrá realizar la compra de pollos pequeños y concentrado.
Él considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener más amplia la granja, en su familia sus circunstancias se mantienen y los ingresos han sido estables.
texts.en:
Santos has decided on a new loan to invest in the business, as she wants to expand her chicken farm. Through this loan she can buy young chickens and feed.

She thinks that the previous loan permitted her to grow and to expand the farm. Her family circumstances and income have been steady.

loans.use: to buy young chickens and feed

loans.name: Jargalsaihan

texts.en: Mr. Jargalsaihan is 39 years old, and lives with his wife and his son in Ger in Govi-Altai province in Mongolia. His wife Altanzaya, aged 37, is an interior designer. During summer she works at private construction companies as a contractor and she works for a small cafeteria during winter. His son Erdenebadrakh, aged 9 goes to primary school. Jargalsaihan had been working as a security guard in a private company since 2007 but quit the job because his wages were not enough to cover his family's expenses. He is planning to operate a firewood and coal selling business at a local market. He has estimated that the potential income and profit will be enough for his family's expenses and he is planning to save extra for his son's future education. He will purchase coal and firewood from a coal mine which is 58 km away from his town and sell to local customers at a higher price. He is now requesting 650,000 MNT to purchase a mini truck to run his newly starting business successfully without any problems. He is a responsible, honest and hardworking man.

loans.use: to purchase a mini truck to run his newly starting business of reselling coal and firewood.

loans.name: Jennyfer Alexandra

texts.es:
Jennyfer es una joven de 19 años de edad, es soltera sin carga familiar, vive con sus padres, estudia la carrera de Derecho en la Universidad de su ciudad en el distrito de San Vicente, se encuentra cursando el octavo ciclo de su carrera, ella trabaja en una empresa comercial de su ciudad, como vendedora, es una chica muy trabajadora, empeñosa, estudiosa y responsable con todo lo que le encomiendan.
Jennyfer tiene más de un año trabajando como vendedora, labora de lunes a domingo y lo hace para así poder pagar sus estudios y siempre apoyar a su familia.
Jennyfer tiene un sueño culminar su carrera de derecho para así poder buscar un trabajo en el cual pueda ejercer su carrera como abogada y convertirse en una gran empresaria exitosa y darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.     
Jennyfer esta agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, porque gracias a su ayuda podrá comprarse una computadora con la cual podrá realizar su trabajo de Universidad.
texts.en:
Jennyfer, 19, is a young, single woman with no dependents.  She lives with her parents and is studying Law at the university in her town of San Vicente.  She’s in the 8th semester of her career.  She works as a salesperson in a local firm.  She’s a very hardworking, dedicated, responsible young woman who is a good student and takes all her responsibilities seriously.

Jennyfer has been working as a saleswoman for more than a year.  She works Monday to Sunday in order to pay for her courses and to help out her family.  Her dream is to get her law degree and be able to find a job where she can practice her profession as an attorney and become a successful businesswoman providing better quality of life for her family.

She’s grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she’ll be able to buy a computer to do her university work.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Salama

texts.en:
Every person has the desire to obtain a life worth living and to feel responsible in the society. Salama is not an exception.  She is a married woman who takes care of her three school-aged children. 

She has a small locale at the market where she sells charcoal. She already has established a good clientele base, and she counts on good results from her business. 

Salama wants to buy more sacks of charcoal for resale. She wants to make some investments in her business so as to meet her customer needs.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Janet

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC,la socia continua dedicandose a su profesion de contadora,la socia lleva años ejerciendo su carrera,la socia cuenta con un local donde realiza su trabajo asesorando a clientes que solicitan sus servicios,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicito el credito para realizar el mantenimiento de su computadora y para algunos gastos personales.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member belongs to the community bank Hatun Rumiyoc. The member continues to work at her job as an accountant. The member has spent many years performing her job. The member found a location where she completes her work giving advice to clients that seek her services. The member is a responsible and earnest person and because of these characteristics the member gets her family ahead. The member seeks the loan to complete the upkeep of her computer and for a few personal expenses. The member feels grateful for the loan she was granted and she undertakes to comply with her established payments.

loans.use: to complete the upkeep of her computer and for a few personal expenses.

loans.name: Maria Toribia

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 56 años, aprobó la escuela primaria con un gran esfuerzo de sus padres, ahora está casada con José de 58 años, tienen 2 hijos de 18 y 12 años de edad, son una familia de escasos recursos pero muy unida. Viven en un sector del campo de la ciudad de Latacunga capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi, una de las provincias que forma parte de la Región Sierra del Ecuador y que los últimos años se ha desarrollado notablemente de tal forma que es considerada una de las más importantes de la región gracias a la industria florícola, minera, metalúrgica, agroindustria, agrícola y ganadera. Además existen establecimientos de negocios que generan interesantes ingresos lo que le convierte en una ciudad comercial y con varias oportunidades para salir adelante. Aunque hay un alto índice de pobreza el espíritu emprendedor de sus habitantes ha hecho que la  ciudad sobresalga. En el sector rural y urbano se puede encontrar familias destacando sus talentos para emprender con alguna idea que les pueda generar rentabilidad para conseguir el sustento diario. María y su familia forman parte de este grupo de personas que aunque no viven en las mejores condiciones, han encontrado en el campo el sustento de vida.
María cada día entre 6 y 8 horas se dedica a criar y cuidar vacas para que produzcan leche y luego de hacer el largo viaje comercializar este producto en las parroquias aledañas y en la ciudad. Tiene una gran experiencia en esta actividad, pues ha sido su trabajo durante 40 años, comenzó desde que era una jovencita, ya que ha sido una costumbre llevar a cabo este negocio en su familia. En su tiempo libre cuida a sus nietos y cuida algunos cultivos de su terreno. Por su experiencia ahora desea comprar vacas para incrementar la producción de leche y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Para cumplir esta meta ha solicitado un crédito a Fundación Alternativa quienes a través del financiamiento de Kiva han podido facilitar a María el dinero para la compra de ganado. María está muy agradecida y piensa que no será la primera vez que estos créditos sean parte de su crecimiento.
texts.en:
María is a 56-year-old woman. She completed primary school with the help of the great effort made by her parents, and now she is married to 58-year-old José. They have two children, ages 18 and 12. They are a family with limited resources but they are very united. 

They live in a sector of the countryside of the city of Latacunga, capitol of the province of Cotopaxi, one of the provinces that make up the region Sierra del Ecuador, and which in recent years has developed in such a notable way that it is considered one of the most important cities of the region thanks to its flower industry, mining, metallurgy, agribusiness, agricultural and livestock industries. There are also business establishments there that generate interest income, making it a market town with several opportunities to get ahead. Even though it has a high poverty rate, the enterprising spirits of its inhabitants have made the city excel. In the rural and urban sectors, you can find families demonstrating their talents in starting businesses with ideas that generate the profits to get them their daily bread. 

María and her family are part of this group of people that, even though they do not live in the best conditions, have found their livelihoods in the countryside. María raises and cares for cows between six and eight hours each day so that they produce milk, and then she makes the long journey to sell this product in the neighboring parishes and in the city.

She has a lot of experience in this, since it has been her job for 40 years. She started when she was very young, as it has been a custom in her family to conduct this business. In her free time she takes care of her grandchildren and cares for some of the crops on her land. Based on her experience she now wishes to buy cows to increase milk production and in this way improve her quality of life and that of her family. 

In order to meet this goal she has requested a loan from Fundación Alternativa, who - through the financing of Kiva - have been able to provide María with the money to purchase cattle. María is very grateful and this will not be the first time that these loans will be part of her growth.

loans.use: to buy cows and increase milk production

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan de 34 años de edad, reside junto a su esposa y a sus 4 hijos menores de edad, 2 de ellos están estudiando en la escuela y son muy aplicados. Es un hombre muy trabajador que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser ejemplo en su hogar ya que cada mañana despierta con nuevas ilusiones y deseos de superación para ser un buen padre de familia. Actualmente Juan tiene una pequeña tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad como leche, huevos entre otros y gracias a Dios posee de clientela ya que por la manera de ser y atender a los clientes lo prefieren esta muy contento porque día a día se ha ido superando, Lastimosamente Juan desde hace un tiempo desea ampliar su única fuente de trabajo y tener un poco mas surtida la tienda es por eso que decidió  acercarse a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder abastecer mas su tienda comprando más producto como queso, pan de dulce, cereales, papel higiénico, sopas entre otras. Agradece a todas esas personas que de buen corazón desea ayudarle y les asegura no defraudarlas.
texts.en:
Juan is 34 years old and lives with his wife and their 4 minor children, 2 of whom are studying very diligently in school. He is a very hard-working man who has always been characterized as an example in his home. Every morning he wakes up with new dreams and desires to get ahead and be a good father to his family.

At present, Juan has a small store where he sells articles of primary necessity, like milk and eggs, among other things.  Thanks to God, he possesses his own clientele, due to his character and the way he attends to the customers who favor his business. 

Juan is quite content because day by day he has been advancing. Determinedly, for some time now Juan has wanted to expand this, his only source of work, and have a greater variety of merchandise in his store, buying more products such as cheese, sweet bread, cereal, toilet paper, and soup, among other items.

He is grateful to everyone who, from the good of their heart, wishes to help him, and he assures them that they will not be defrauded.

loans.use: buy merchandise for his store, including cheese, sweet bread, cereals, toilet paper, and soup, among other items.

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
